name: Project Train [WIP]
description:
[WIP - This is barely even a prototype, it uses the default UE4 character and has only a basis of what I want the levels to be laid out like]

The end goal of this game is to have a collection of different tube stations and train lines, with a randomly placed goal and patrolling enemies mingling with friendly NPCs, with working trains, escalators and ticket barriers.

At the moment, all that is there is an exit that doesn't move, five enemies who patrol randomly around the station and, if they see you, will chase you a little bit stupidly. Oh, and everything is stupidly bright because I don't really know how to do lighting yet.
